definition: (of a list, music chart etc) to reach the top

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Joyride topped the US chart in spring 1991.
sentences.chinese: 專輯《逍遙遊》於1991年春榮登美國排行榜榜首。

sentences.english: Was the champion of HK and Singapore box office.
sentences.chinese: 香港和新加坡票房榮登同期港產票房冠軍。

sentences.english: But still, I expect China to topple US at the top.
sentences.chinese: 不過我還是期望中國超過美國榮登榜首。
